user.title: TacToe
user.description: Tic Tac Toe is a simple two-player game played on a 3x3 grid, where players take turns marking a square with either X or O, with the goal of getting three in a row vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before their opponent. The game ends in a draw if all squares are filled without a player getting three in a row.

user.title: Hangman
user.description: Hangman is a classic word-guessing game where players attempt to guess a secret word by suggesting letters. Incorrect guesses result in a hangman illustration being drawn, with the game ending when the illustration is complete or the word is successfully guessed.

user.title: Swoosh - ReactJS
user.description: First ReactJS app. Follow the instructions on GitHub for installation options.
